name: Stacc (Lio Lim)
description:
Stacc is a multiplayer turn-based strategy board game, where you move around the board, stacking your tokens on top of opponent tokens to eventually form the tallest stack!

Controls:  Mouse only
Rules: TBC

Made for fun for NUS NM4260 Game Design: 
https://nusmods.com/modules/NM4260/game-design
Theme: Growth
Restriction: make a game using the PiecePack https://piecepack.net/

Best played using Windows 10, in a Google Chrome browser
